Flow.description: All advance logic to convert lead to Account & Contact V16 added "deceased and deceased date into "get lead record" and "IsParent2Deceased" formula. MH Added into Initialize Parent 2, Remove Capitalization in child with cancer + Portal Access

formulas.description: Formula to compute Family type of Account
formulas.name: acc_familyType
formulas.expression: CASE({!originatingLead.Reason_for_Joining__c}, "Child with cancer", "Patient Family", "Child passed away due to cancer", "Bereaved Family", "Parent passed away due to cancer", "Offspring Bereaved Family", "Parent with cancer", "Offspring Family", "Parent or primary carer with cancer", "Offspring Family", "")

formulas.description: Data Type between lead and contact is different
formulas.name: IsParent1Patient
